column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) of the head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with sagittal section. We observe slice n°114 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The image reveals the presence of the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4715.7715 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4885.8398 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 299.2676 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 622.2656 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1618.9453 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 460.1074 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 296.6309 mm³, the left globus pallidus of volume 31.6406 mm³, the brainstem of volume 404.7363 mm³, the left hippocampus of volume 14.5020 mm³, the left nucleus accumbens of volume 59.3262 mm³ and the left ventral diencephalon of volume 181.9336 mm³.
